languages.text: "Не забуду, Ваша Светлость. Мы все не забудем преподобного Иеронимуса и уроков, что он нам преподнес. Смилуйся Бог-Император над его душой".
"I will remember, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. We'll all remember Reverend Hieronymus and the lessons he taught us. May the God-Emperor have mercy on his soul."
languages.original_text: "Не забуду, Ваша Светлость. Мы все не забудем преподобного Иеронимуса и уроков, что он нам преподнес. Смилуйся Бог-Император над его душой".

traits.locale_text: "I will remember, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. We'll all remember Father Hieronymus and the lessons he taught us. May the God-Emperor have mercy on his soul."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "I will remember, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. We'll all remember Father Hieronymus and the lessons he taught us. May the God-Emperor have mercy on his soul."

traits.locale_text: "I will remember, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. We'll all remember Reverend Hieronymus and the lessons he taught us. May the God-Emperor have mercy on his soul."

traits.locale_text: "I will remember, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. We'll all remember Reverend Hieronymus and the lessons he taught us. May the God-Emperor have mercy on his soul."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: “我会记住的，大人。我们所有人都会牢牢记住希罗尼穆斯牧师，以及他留给我们的教训。愿神皇怜悯他的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "I will remember, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. We'll all remember Reverend Hieronymus and the lessons he taught us. May the God-Emperor have mercy on his soul."

traits.locale_text: “我会记住的，大人。我们所有人都会牢牢记住希罗尼穆斯，以及他留给我们的教训。愿神皇怜悯他的灵魂。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: 「陛下、私は忘れません。ヒエロニムス司祭と彼が教えてくれた教訓を。神帝陛下よ、彼の魂に慈悲がありますように」
languages.original_text: "I will remember, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. We'll all remember Reverend Hieronymus and the lessons he taught us. May the God-Emperor have mercy on his soul."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、私は忘れません。ヒエロニムス司祭と彼が教えてくれた教訓を。神帝陛下よ、彼の魂に慈悲がありますように」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: «Lo recordaré, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Todos recordaremos al reverendo Hieronymus y las lecciones que nos enseñó. Que el Dios Emperador se apiade de su alma».
languages.original_text: "I will remember, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. We'll all remember Reverend Hieronymus and the lessons he taught us. May the God-Emperor have mercy on his soul."

traits.locale_text: «Lo recordaré, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Todos recordaremos al padre Hieronymus y las lecciones que nos enseñó. Que el Dios Emperador se apiade de su alma».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Ich werde es mir merken, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Wir werden uns alle an Reverend Hieronymus und seine Lektionen erinnern. Möge der Gottimperator seiner Seele gnädig sein."
languages.original_text: "I will remember, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. We'll all remember Reverend Hieronymus and the lessons he taught us. May the God-Emperor have mercy on his soul."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde es mir merken, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Wir werden uns alle an Vater Hieronymus und seine Lektionen erinnern. Möge der Gottimperator seiner Seele gnädig sein."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: « Je m'en souviendrai, Votre Seigneurie. Nous n'oublierons pas les leçons que le révérend Hiéronymus nous a apprises. Que l'Empereur-Dieu ait pitié de son âme. »
languages.original_text: "I will remember, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. We'll all remember Reverend Hieronymus and the lessons he taught us. May the God-Emperor have mercy on his soul."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'en souviendrai, Votre Seigneurie. Nous n'oublierons pas les leçons que le père Hiéronymus nous a apprises. Que l'Empereur-Dieu ait pitié de son âme. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Unutmayacağım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Muhterem Hieronymus'u ve onun bize öğrettiği dersleri hiçbirimiz unutmayacağız. Tanrı İmparator ruhuna merhamet etsin."
languages.original_text: "I will remember, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. We'll all remember Reverend Hieronymus and the lessons he taught us. May the God-Emperor have mercy on his soul."

traits.locale_text: "Unutmayacağım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Muhterem Hieronymus'u ve onun bize öğrettiği dersleri hiçbirimiz unutmayacağız. Tanrı İmparator ruhuna merhamet etsin."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04
